newsitem.title: SPAIN: Two German children found dead in Spanish hotel.
newsitem.headline: Two German children found dead in Spanish hotel.

text.p: Two German children were found dead in a hotel on the Spanish island of Majorca on Friday in what police believe was a suicide plot by their missing father, officials said.
Katharina and Matthias Oyntzen, aged 8 and 6 respectively, appear to have died from a poison injection, the officials said.
A chambermaid discovered their bodies on Friday morning in an apartment at a hotel complex in Sa Coma where they had been staying with their father Ruedger since August 23.
Police are looking for the man, a German doctor, who left behind two letters in which he said he planned to kill himself.
The family were frequent guests at the hotel. They were due to leave for Frankfurt on Friday.
